content.prompt: The Fang reliquary figure sat on top of a container that primarily held

choices.label: the skins and teeth of animals associated with sacred deities
ritual objects made of gold or other precious metals
ancestral relics, most often in the form of bone fragments
ceremonial masks, which were used during the initiation of young men

topic.text: 6.2: Purpose and Audience in African Art

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe contextual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. function.  b. context.  c. siting or physical context.  d. subject matter.  e. reception.
